about_the_game:
Tenebra is a dark metroidvania that blends rich storytelling with souls-like elements in a hand-drawn 2D world. Journey with the Shattered One, a doll trying to understand why he was created, in a face-swapping adventure as he discovers new abilities through exploring, forging bonds with NPCs, and fighting.

SETTING AND PROTAGONIST

You awaken in a mysterious basement, your memories lost and your face shattered. As you regain consciousness, the only familiar sight is the ethereal light source above, beckoning you into an unknown world. Who made you, and why?

THE WORLD OF TENEBRA

Step into a fallen utopia where baroque elegance collides with alchemy. Though once flawless and flamboyant, many city districts now teeter on the brink of ruin. Some pockets of life persist amidst the decay, but other have succumbed to great sins and filth. Your choices will determine the fate of this fractured land.

MASKS

The main source of power for the Shattered One is his mask-shifting ability. Some masks may aid him in combat and exploration, but others work in mysterious ways, opening up new strategies.

PUZZELS

Your journey through Tenebra will challenge both your physical prowess and mental acuity. Solve intricate puzzles that will test your problem-solving skills, and unlock new paths forward.

EXPLORATION

Uncover the secrets of Tenebra across seven distinctive areas, each filled with breathtaking views and hidden treasures. Meet intriguing NPCs and discover valuable items as you delve deeper into the world.

SOULS-LIKE COMBAT

Steel yourself for intense battles against the Engrams—manifestations of tormented minds and emotions. These mysterious beings, born from the corruption of their surroundings, will test your combat skills and reflexes. Master a souls-like combat system where your abilities and strategy are key to survival.

CAST OF ENIGMATIC CHARACTERS

Though at times your journey may feel lonely, you are not alone in Tenebra. Encounter a diverse cast of characters, some of who offer guidance, while others may harbor their own agendas. Trust carefully as you navigate the complex web of relationships in this shattered world.

JOIN THE TENEBRA COMMUNITY

Become part of the Tenebra universe by joining our Discord community. Connect with fellow adventurers, share your experiences, and stay updated on the latest news and developments.

Prepare to embark on a haunting adventure where every shattered piece tells a story. Can you uncover the truth behind your fractured existence and shape the destiny of Tenebra?

name: Tenebra

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+ (1GB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space

short_description: Unmask the secrets of a fractured utopia in "Tenebra,"a hand-drawn 2D Metroidvania where baroque excess meets technology. Collect ornate masks to unlock mysterious powers, solve intricate puzzles, and battle through a world that's equal parts Versailles and Dark Souls.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support
